short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filters specific products from search results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome browser extension that automatically filters out search results containing specific keywords related to boycott products. The extension works on Google, yahoo , Bing , DuckDuckGo and Baidu search engines and updates results in real-time.
